Why I Started the Shenzhen SEO Conference

Hi, my name is J.P. Zhang, the host of the Shenzhen SEO Conference. After 15+ years in the SEO industry, I've seen what's possible when the East and West learn from each other and work together.

This conference is meant to be that bridge. A place where global SEO entrepreneurs and professionals can meet, share ideas, build real partnerships â€“ all while exploring China and its fast-moving digital ecosystem.

My goal is simple: help build a truly global SEO community. See you in Shenzhen!

Why Shenzhen SEO Conference?

The only conference bridging Eastern and Western SEO strategies in China's innovation capital.

East-West Insights

Learn strategies for Baidu, WeChat, Google, and global platforms from industry experts.

Global Network

Connect with SEO professionals from 15+ countries and build lasting partnerships.

Innovation Hub

Experience Shenzhen's cutting-edge tech ecosystem and entrepreneurial spirit.

Actionable Strategies

Walk away with proven tactics you can implement immediately for your business.

5-Day Conference Schedule

Five days of SEO excellence, networking, and knowledge sharing in Shenzhen.

Workshop
Monday
Workshops & City Tours
September 14, 2026

Specialized workshops for Chinese attendees and guided city tours for international visitors to explore Shenzhen's tech districts

Day 2
Mastermind
Tuesday
SEO Mastermind
September 15, 2026

Intensive small-group mastermind sessions with industry SEO experts and peers

Day 3
Conference
Wednesday
Main Conference Day
September 16, 2026

Full day of keynotes, talks, panels, breakout sessions, and opening party.

Day 4
Conference
Thursday
Main Conference Day
September 17, 2026

Full day of talks, panels, breakout sessions, and closing party.

Day 5
Networking
Friday
VIP Networking
September 18, 2026

Exclusive networking event for VIP ticket holders with speakers and sponsors, in a different 5-star hotel (not the conference hotel).
